author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERNESTO CLOSING IN ON BERMUDA... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LIFE-THREATENING  FLOODING EXPECTED TO BEGIN LATER THIS AFTERNOON...
summary:
...ERNESTO CLOSING IN ON BERMUDA... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LIFE-THREATENING  FLOODING EXPECTED TO BEGIN LATER THIS AFTERNOON...
 As of 2:00 PM AST Fri Aug 16
 the center of Ernesto was located near 30.0, -66.1
 with movement NNE at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 969 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Ernesto (AT5/AL052024)
